review: So far so good! Set up was easy; was able to start watching shows within 10 minutes of opening the box.
author: gep25nla

review: Let me say that I am very impressed by what Amazon has done with this gizmo.  We have 2 rokus and 3 Chromecasts.  I added this to a new 50 inch LG TV that we placed in the bedroom.  I actually like this better than the Chromecast and the Roku!  Why?....because of the remote control and remote voice search android application.  They will be adding a remote application for IOS soon.  I also like the fact that you can play some games on it.  The menus are good enough and the free prime movies are clearly indicated on the movie thumbnails.  I also think that the streaming works better than my Roku and if you go to the home screen and leave for awhile it reverts to displaying beautiful photos on my TV that are much nicer than the Chromecast photos.  I'd like to see them add more apps to it like TED.
author: FrankK

review: This is the perfect companion to any HDMI pug and a smart TV along with its Chromecast buddy plugged next to it! I love its UI and its ease of set up. Very inexpensive means of entertainment! Well done Amazon!!
author: brian s thomas

review: Overall it works well, especially for the price.  But I am knocking off two stars until Amazon supports Mira-cast fully (as it advertises it does).  Mira-Cast works form my Android devices, but it doesn't support Windows 8.  True Mira-cast is not platform specific.  It should work across any devices that claim to be certified.  Google it for more information.  Amazon, please fix this!

review: The Fire Stick is even more than I expected. We love it. Have been amazed at how well it ties in with my Kindle and Fire Phone. Very easy to move from one TV to another, we even took it to the beach with us. Only problem we experienced was with our large TV which is attached to a speaker system and a cable box. It took us a while to figure out that you should only have the TV turned on and not the total system or you will not get sound.We could not be more pleased
